info.name: Blue Grey YNAB
info.description:
A darker spin on YNAB - did not test on brand new accounts (tutorials)

Also supports YNAB toolkit
info.additionalInfo:
---26.03.2018---
* small fixes to new YNAB colours

---25.07.2017---
+ Added manage payees colours

---05.05.2017---
* Fixed bolded text being black

---25.04.2017---
* Fixed import popup black text

---17.03.2017---
* Fixed "Close Account" popup border

---09.03.2017---
* Fixed checkbox borders
* Fixed black reconcile popup text
* Fixed general white background in reports tab

---01.03.2017---
* Made accounts view rows darker to match other areas
* Darkened Net Worth tooltip


---28.02.2017---
* Fixed Net Worth bar tooltip
* Fixed some menus backgrounds and hightlight colors

---27.02.2017---
* Fixed table rows in budget view
* Made ZERO values less visible, for clarity
* Fixed aditional text clarity issues.
* Fixed header bar when adding transactions
+ added custom scrollbar (won't work in Mozilla)
* modified loading gradient to be in tune with theme
* fixed budget goals at 100%
+ added theme for YNAB toolkit
* fixed YNAB toolkit panels looking bad
+ added a pseudo-fix for YNAB toolkit's white gradient progress pace bars
